title.value: Effect of environmental conditions of an industrial complex on the efficiency of the use of pigs of different constitutional types
Влияние условий среды промышленного комплекса на эффективность использования свинок различных конституциональных типов

journal.title: Zootechnical Science of Belarus: collection of scientific papers

person.name: Khodosovskij, V.N., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: It was determined in experiments carried out on replacement pigs of various constitutional types that the animals of leptosomic type at a large industrial pig farm to 6 months of age grew faster than coevals of transitional and airysomal types (31 and 29 g, respectively). Most part of the animals of this type (20%) dropped out during the period from 6 - to 8.5 months of age. Most of them were culled because of defective limb diseases, digestive tract diseases, and respiratory tract diseases. In conditions of industrial technology replacement pigs and sows of transitional type compared to individuals of airysomic and leptosoic types are characterized by higher productivity: early terms of insemination (by 3.2 and 3.3 days, respectively), safety of young animals by weaning (by 5.8 and 5%, respectively), higher litter weight by weaning (by 7.1 and 6.3 kg), greater ratio of implementation to the main stock (by 4 and 6%)
